resources.string: Last updated less than a minute ago
Get a notification on your watch when your phone is %s%% charged
Get a notification on your phone when your watch is %s%% charged
Get a notification on your watch when your phone has less than %s%% battery
Get a notification on your phone when your watch has less than %s%% battery
We were unable to notify you when your watch battery was charged, due to notifications being disabled in your system settings. We have disabled watch battery charge notifications because of this.
We were unable to notify you when your watch battery was low, due to notifications being disabled in your system settings. We have disabled watch battery low notifications because of this.
